REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2356 reute r f BC-AMEX-ADDS-WYSE-TECHNO 03-16 0054

TEXT.TITLE: AMEX ADDS WYSE TECHNOLOGY <WYSE> OPTIONS
TEXT.BODY: The <American Stock Exchange> said it has started put and call option trading in the common stock of Wyse Technology, with initial expiration months of April, July and October and position and exercise limits of 5,500 contracts on the same side of the market. Reuter
